turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love italian cuisine, its my favorite

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Italy has some fine Italian cuisine. There are so many options.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love anything with tomatoes or pasta or cheese

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Italian cuisine has developed so much through the centuries of economic and social changes.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Is it popular throughout the world?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Very much so. With the discovery of the New World Italian Cuisine was introduced to the bell peppers, potatoes, and sugar beets.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Interesting, bell peppers are a huge part of my Italian recipes

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: There is even a regional diversity in Italian Cuisine. Especially between south and north Italy.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Oh what are the differences between the regions as far as food?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Their styles are a little different. Italian cuisine is one of the most copied in the wolrd because of its popularity.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Do you enjoy fishing, it is one of my best outdoor fun?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yeah, fishing is fun! I love using multiple techniques to catch bigger fish too such as angling and trapping them.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I do not want bigger fish. I only want to use the traditional hook and line

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Hmm, that's interesting. So you don't like catching other animals like mollusks or crabs?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love crabs but i have never caught them before. I buy it if i feel like taking it

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yeah, I agree. I feel like it's too much of a process to catch your own crabs. Same goes with Lobster.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: What other parts of fishing do you like or are you an expert in?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I mean, I really like experimenting with my bait, hooks and tackles to see how they affect my catching times.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Blue is my favorite color, by far. What's yours?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I like blue too. It's between violet and green on the spectrum of light.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Haha yeah, ROYGBIV right? I feel like blue is a very popular favorite color. A lot of people I know really like the color blue.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: The eye sees blue when the wavelength is between 450 and 495 nanometres.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: So interesting to think about. I get kinda tripped out when I start to think about all color as just being illusions of light waves. Some animals can't even see blue, just because of how their eyes process light. Weird

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: The sky and the sea appear blue because of an effect called Rayleigh scattering. They aren't really blue.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Wow, really? I always thought the sky was blue because it was reflecting the ocean. At least thats what im pretty sure I learned in school lol

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Blue eyes are explained by an effect called Tyndall scattering.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I love rock music, it is my favorite genre.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love Hard Rock and Punk Music. What's your favorite band?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I love Joan Jett.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Old school I like it. Do you like Iggy Pop he was popular around the same time.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Iggy Pop was the godfather of Punk. Of course I liked him.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Music is my passion. From the classic rock time period I like everyone Rod Stewert to the White Snake.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I wish I was around in the 1950's when rock and roll originated.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: You can still get a taste. Glen Danzig who used to play in the Misfit's wrote for Elvis and Johnny Cash. His music has a similar style.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Blue is my favorite color of all time.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Me too. I love to use it while painting and it's used a lot since it's one of the three primary colors.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: What does it mean to be a primary color?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: A set of real colors that can be combined to produce other colors.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Cool. What are the other 2 primary colors?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Red and yellow.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Oh ok, so red and yellow make orange, blue and yellow make green and red and blue make purple right?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I'm not sure I only know that most blues contain a slight mixture of other colors. For example azure contains some green.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: That's interesting to know!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yeah, also in the eighth century Chinese artists used cobalt blue to paint white porcelain.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I am a disc jockey

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Oh cool! So you play existing recorded music for a live audience?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I do! It is pretty fast paced

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Club DJ. Rocking all night!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Cool!!! Do you also create mixes, remixes and tracks that are recorded for later sale and distribution?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love mixing. I think that is my passion

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Neat! Do you also do what's done in hip hop music, where DJs may create beats, using percussion breaks, basslines and other musical content sampled from pre-existing records?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Yeah, we do a lot of that. It is a lot of listening to headphones.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: True! Do you also use use those beats to rap over?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: HI do you use youtube?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Absolutely.  YouTube is the world's largest video platform.  I am sure most people have used or seen it is some form.  Do you use it?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Of course! I am starting my own brand on youtube.  Its amazing how its grown over the last few years

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: That is great!  What brand are you currently developing, and what social impact do you want to bring to the platform?

turns.speaker: USER

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: That is excellent.  I understand that the Food and Drug Administration regulates cosmetics; however, you are looking to simply share thoughts on the looks / feel of them?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Yeah Im young and its a nice outlet and way to share something that is my passion.  Particularly I am interested in showcasing  cost effective brands that are also socially responsible

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I agree.  I believe people need to be socially responsible in their investments and purchases.  I think we have a duty to look for more than profit.  Life is more than food and clothes.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: My new obsession is cross country running. I love running out in nature and dirt trails.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Cross country running is fun, but can be challenging. The courses are long and include varied surfaces and include hills.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Yes, it is quite a challenge.  I'm training to compete, which most competitions take place in fall and winter, but worried about running when it rains or snows. That will be even more of a challenge.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Oh sure, running in sleet or snow or hail would be awful!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: A course can be from 2 1/2 to 7 1/2 miles long. My farthest has been 3 miles so far. Formal competitions go back to a 19th century English game called "hare and hound" or "the paper chase"

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Is that why the runners are sometimes called "harriers"?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: That's an interesting fact, I didn't know that. It used to be an Olympic sport. During a 1924 race in a Paris heat wave, 8 runners were taken away on a stretcher. I hope that's not me.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Wow, that would be really unfortunate. It must have been a grueling race. There's an English championship that was the first national competition, started in 1876!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I just love to bake. I'm always in the kitchen baking something.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I always enjoy baking, too.  I am not real good, but I like to try new things.  The most common thing to bake is bread, but there are all types of other kinds to bake.  What do you like to bake/?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I really like to bake cakes, there are so many options with that. Bread is most common but I have not tried my own yet

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yes,I love cookies; probably a bit too much.  I will usually just let a baker do the specialty breads for me.  But I like to bake cookies too.  What are you favorite cookies to bake/?  Or what varieties of cookies do you bake/?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I enjoy baking chocolate chip cookies, never last long though. I also like making oatmeal, those are my second favorite

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Chocolate Chip cookies actually originated in the United States around 1938.  A lady named Ruth Wakefield chopped up bits of a Nestle chocolate bar into a cookie.  Thus, the chocolate chip cookie - which I love!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Oh how interesting! Wonder why her name is never associated with any cookies then?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I agree.  The only name I know of associated with cookies is the Girl Scouts!  LOL.

turns.utterance: they specialize in cash crops to make as much as possible

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: sugar cane is a huge commodity and i like sugar

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Sugar is also one of my favorites, I put a lot of it in my morning coffee.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Have you ever played tennis? It's my favorite sport!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yes I love tennis, I use to play it in the Olympics, I played with people of all ages.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: That's amazing, do you know when it was first invented?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Well it originated in Birmingham, England, way back in the late 19th century as a sport known as lawn tennis.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I see, I didn't know tennis came from England!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yes and of course the rules tennis have changed only very little since the 1890s.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Wow, that's surprising!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: It is indeed, I love how pretty much anyone who can hold a tennis racket can play, including handicapped wheelchair users.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I am super pumped about my move. Guess where? London! Except, I know nothing about it except it's in a childrens nursery rhyme

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Hahaha.  That is about all you need to know.  It'll be awesome for you if you like big cities.  It is the most populous city in the UK.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: So there is a lot of people then? Oh dear... I suffer from anxiety and anxious of this trip already. Know how many people?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I'm not really sure of the exact number, but it is quite a few.  Will you be living in the city center or in one of the surrounding areas like Essex, Surry, or Kent?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I will be living in Kent I believe. You know on the weather there? Thanks for all this info btw

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: No problem, glad to help.  I think it is pretty dreary most of the time, but it is such a vibrant city you won't even notice the weather.  And there is plenty to do there, it is the most visited city in the world!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Good news there, I like my cities like I like my heart... dreary. This is going to work out great. I am ready to leave them. Waiting for my boss to confirm the ticket

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Very cool.  Are you in the financial industry by chance?  I only ask because of the size of the financial centre.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I for sure am. So it's large over there you mean?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Oh yeah, it is the biggest financial centre in the world.  It is the most of a lot of things in the world.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Ice cream is one of the greatest creations culinary wise since the invention of sliced bread. What is your favorite ice cream?

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: That sounds simply amazing especially since cookies and cream is one of my favorites. Have you ever tried a Carvel ice cream cake?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: This is very true because in italy i think they have their own style of ice cream called gelato, Do you know of any other style of ice cream?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Frozen yogurt and sorbet are considered ice cream. :)

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I love frozen yogurt! I used to work at pinkberry when i was in highschool it was heaven on earth

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I Bet! Flavorings and colors are added once the cream is made.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I think tacos are my favorite food! I could eat them every day!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I love tacos, especially beef or chicken, with all the toppings!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Me too!  I know that tacos are considered to be Mexican food, but is that who invented them?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Origins for the taco are not precisely known!

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Well whoever invented them deserves a medal! Do you like tacos with a crunchy shell or the soft tortilla?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I prefer them the authentic way, wrapped in a corn tortilla.

turns.speaker: USER

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Because it is delicious!  I also enjoy other Mexican street food staples, such as tamales, nachos, and pozole.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I've never heard of pozole! What is it? I love Mexican street corn. It's amazing!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Pozole is a traditional mexican stew made from pork and hominy, topped with shredded cabbage, radishes, and chili peppers.  So good.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Yellow is my favorite color it reminds me of the sun

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: It's very pretty, its between green and orange in the color spectrum.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Yes its a primary color and noticeable so its often used for cautionary signage

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: That makes sense. Carotenoids are what makes corn and lemons and daffofils their yellow color.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I have noticed the color yellow will fade if exposed to direct sun daily

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: There was an episode of The SImpsons called "The Color Yellow" too, it recieved mixed reviews though.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Did you ever see the Beatles movie Yellow Submarine?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I haven't but I have heard the soundtrack to the film, it premiered in July 1968 if I remember correctly.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: When giving Roses the color yellow signifies eternal love

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I didn't know that!

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I enjoy ice cream because it is often made from milk and cream and combined with fruits or other ingredients and flavors.

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: I really enjoy ice cream too. However I can't eat it anymore because I'm lactose intolerant.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: I am sorry. that means you have abdominal pain, bloating, diarrhea, gas, and nausea whenever you take it

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: That is true. I have dealt with those medical conditions for sometime. I remember my favorite flavor was Oreo.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: That is cool. Have you ever tried the ones used with other sweeteners other than sugar

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: The ones that are lactose free? I have. They are good, but seem to have a weird after taste. I don't buy them much anymore.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yes some sugar alternatives that are not produced by nature do have that quality

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Which sugar is your favorite? Do you like sugar cane?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yes and i like taking if raw from the stout, jointed, fibrous stalks that are rich in the sugar sucrose

turns.speaker: USER
turns.utterance: Sucrose is an organic molecule related to fructose or lactose. Did you know that?

turns.speaker: USER

turns.speaker: SYSTEM

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: Yellow, as it so happens, is made by carotenoids on things like autumn leaves, corn, and egg yolks. I guess you could say those are naturally occuring yellows.

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: No problem!

turns.utterance: Both, kind of! Some people only do the year. So for example, you're born in the year 1990 so you're also a horse! But month effects the elemental sub-class of your zodiac. So you're a metal horse! We're both 27, happy birthday! (: Did you do anything fun?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: A metal horse?! I wonder what metal signifies in the Chinese Zodiac? Is that considered a different element than earth? Hmm, while kind of random, I think I watched a bunch of oldHitchcock movies like Psycho.

I guess very old age) stuff, but it's always fun to see what's accurate and what your friends are, you know? Ohh are you big into horror movies? I love them! I've been trying to friend friends who'll watch old horror movies with me for years but alas, no luck. Is Psycho one of your favorite titles?

Found footage is also a lot of fun too. It's pretty campy but if it's done well it can be really immersive. Other than slashers is there anything you like?
